Header: 57 Div Troops Provide Security to Meeting
Content: 57 Division troops of the Security Force Headquarters - Kilinochchi (SFHQ-KLN), together with the Police provided necessary security for a meeting of ‘Samurdhi’ recipients, held at Kilinochchi Central College on Sunday (2). The meeting attended by more than 4500 civilians was attended by a few Ministers who were responsible for distribution of those reliefs among the recipients. In close coordination with the Police, Major General Vijitha Ravipriya, Commander, Security Forces - Kilinochchi directed the troops of the 57 Division to liaise with the Police for security arrangements.
